name: Donald John Trump
bio: 45th U.S. president (2017-2021), known for real estate business and TV fame. His term saw two impeachments and a 2020 election loss to Joe Biden
notoriousFor: efforts to overturn the 2020 election results
platform: tax cuts and deregulation, border wall and strict immigration policies, renegotiating trade deals, repeal and replace Obamacare, “America First” foreign policy.
previousPoliticalExperience: before his presidency, he had limited political experience, briefly running in the 2000 Reform Party primaries and considering presidential bids in 1988, 2004, and 2012

policies.healthcare: Opposed to the Affordable Care Act, supports private healthcare
policies.economy: Pro-tax cuts, deregulation, and promoting American businesses
policies.immigration: Supports stricter immigration laws and building a border wall
policies.gunControl: Supports the Second Amendment, against many gun control measures
policies.climateChange: Skeptical, withdrew the U.S. from the Paris Agreement
policies.education: Supports school choice and reducing federal role in education
policies.taxes: Advocates for tax cuts, particularly for businesses and high-income individuals
policies.lgbtqRights: Mixed; rolled back some protections but expressed support for same-sex marriage
policies.drugPolicy: Tough on drugs, supports stricter penalties and anti-drug initiatives
policies.criminalJusticeReform: Signed the First Step Act, supports prison reform
policies.votingRights: Opposed expansive voting reforms, raised concerns about election security
